1.title: Acoustic Foo A Cure

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Sammy heads to the Fillmore in San Francisco for his annual Acoustic-4-A-Cure concert; Sammy sits down with Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins of Foo Fighters, and later takes the stage with Vic Johnson.

2.title: Lake TaWho

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Sammy flies to Lake Tahoe to meet up with singer Roger Daltrey; Sammy performs one of The Who's most well-known classics, and sits down with Roger to reminisce about playing the 1973 Charlton Festival.

3.title: Rockstar

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Sammy travels to Denver, where he meets up with the band Nickelback; Sammy and Chad Kroeger check out vinyl at the Twist and Shout record store, and later, put on a memorable performance of one of many Nickelback's chart-topping hits.

4.title: Dirty White Boys

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Sammy joins guitarist Mick Jones at the Circuit of the Americas race track in Austin, Texas; Sammy and Mick race cars around the track and perform Foreigner's hit "Dirty White Boy."

5.title: L.A. Metal

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Sammy heads to the Loudwire Awards in L.A., where he receives the Humanitarian Award, and sits down with Rob Halford, for a Q and A. Sammy then heads to the Adopt the Arts event, where he performs with Matt Sorum and Kings of Chaos.

6.title: Acoustic Part Deux

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Sammy heads back to the Fillmore Theatre in San Francisco, California, to feature the female artists in this Mother's Day special of his annual Acoustic 4-A-Cure concert.

7.title: Cruisin' with the Redheads

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Join Sammy this week as he takes to the high seas on the Rock Legends Cruise. Sammy takes the stage with Paul Rodgers and Bad Company as they perform a hit song together, while cruising the deep blue sea with Todd Rundgren and others.

8.title: Mardi Gras

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Sammy heads to one of the biggest parties of the year, Mardi Gras. Join him as he takes to the streets of New Orleans, checks out the world-famous floats, performs with Trombone Shorty, and hangs out with celebrity chef Emeril Lagasse.

9.title: Rock & Roll Journey

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Sammy stops by the world-famous Record Plant in San Francisco, California, and interviews Neal Schon of Journey. After an intimate conversation about the recording process and history of the studio, Sammy and Neal perform "Personal Jesus."

10.title: Look What the Cat Dragged In

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Sammy stops in Scottsdale, Arizona where he meets up with Poison frontman Bret Michaels. The two iconic rockers sit down for a "Mad Max" style performance of "Your Mama Don't Dance" and tour Bret's unique Arizona home.

11.title: Sammy 24/7

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Live a day in the life with Sammy Hagar as he travels from Oklahoma to Rockfest in Kansas City. Once arriving at Rockfest, Sammy goes backstage with some of the biggest names in rock, followed by a performance with The Circle.

12.title: Red Til I'm (Not) Dead

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: Join Sammy and an all-star lineup as they celebrate Sammy's 70th birthday at the Cabo Wabo Cantina in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico.

1.title: Sunset Strip

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Sammy heads to Sunset Blvd to reminisce at the Whisky A-Go-Go with Van Halen legend Michael Anthony, before visiting with former Motley Crue drummer Tommy Lee at his house. The All Star Trio then performs at Tommy's studio.

2.title: San Fran & the Dead

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Join Sammy as he heads west to Mill Valley, California to catch up with members of the Grateful Dead. Prepare to become a Deadhead as Sammy joins Bob Weir for an acoustic set at the Sweetwater Music Hall followed by a spacey jam at Mickey Hart's studio in the mountains.

3.title: Cooperstown

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Things heat up this week when Sammy takes a trip to Phoenix, Arizona to meet up with 'the Godfather of Shock Rock', Alice Cooper.

4.title: Carolina Rebellion

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Sammy teams up with his band The Circle featuring Jason Bonham, to headline Florida's largest waterfront music festival, SunFest, before heading to North Carolina to headline the Carolina Rebellion Festival in front of 50k rocking fans.

5.title: LA Grammy Museum

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Sammy explores the Grammy Museum at L.A. Live with REO Speedwagon legend, Kevin Cronin. Later joined by Heart's Nancy Wilson and Alice In Chain's Jerry Cantrell. They exchange personal stories, followed by an intimate performance.

6.title: Cabo Birthday Bash

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Sammy flies down to Cabo for his annual "Birthday Bash" to perform for his fans called the "Redheads". Its an exclusive, behind the scenes celebration that is now its 20th year.

7.title: Best of Season 1

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot:

1.title: Acoustic 4 a Cure

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Sammy Hagar heads to the landmark Fillmore Theatre in San Francisco to perform his annual Acoustic-4-A-Cure Concert. He sits down with John Mayer and Joe Satriani and later they all hit the stage with fellow musicians James Hetfield (Metallica), Melissa Etheridge, Pat Monahan (Train), and Tommy Lee (Motley Crue).

2.title: Big Dog Daddy

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Sammy flies to Norman, Oklahoma to hang out with Toby Keith. They visit Toby's restaurant and then do an interview and an acoustic performance at Toby's 160-acre ranch.

3.title: Small Town

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: This week, Sammy travels to Bloomington, Indiana to hang with John Mellencamp at his art studio. They discuss John's career, Farm Aid, and his passion for painting.

4.title: Two Stops

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Sammy drops in with Cheap Trick's guitar God Rick Nielsen in Chicago to talk rock history. He then heads to Denver, Colorado to play the iconic Red Rocks Amphitheatre with his band The Circle (Michael Anthony, Jason Bonham and Vic Johnson).

5.title: Blues & Wine

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Sammy drops by the unique concert hall, Mountain Winery, in Saratoga, California to sit down with ZZ Top's Billy Gibbons to talk rock and roll, followed by an intimate blues performance.

6.title: Aloha Fleetwood

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Sammy travels to Maui to visit with Fleetwood Mac founder Mick Fleetwood. The Maui neighbors catch up on music and art and jump on stage at Fleetwoods on Front Street to perform a Fleetwood Mac classic.

7.title: Livin' Live

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Sammy Hagar brings you never before seen performances featuring Sammy and various guests from Season 2 so far.

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

12.title: South by DMC

episode of.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: Sammy is honored as a keynote speaker at the World's Biggest Music Festival, South By Southwest (SXSW) in Austin, Texas. He then joins Rock and Roll Hall of Famer, Pioneer of Hip Hop, Run-DMC Frontman; Darryl McDaniels, in a Rock-Rap jam with Sammy and Band. A performance for all musical tastes.

imdb.title: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar
akas: Rock & Roll Road Trip with Sammy Hagar (United States)
plot: Sammy Hagar travels the country interviewing and often performing with some of the most influential rock stars of the past 40 years.::Roger Dozier
